creator: (주)오케이몰
descriptionHtml:
OKmall is not a sales intermediary site like other typical shopping mall or online marketplace.
All the thousands of items sold at OKmall is purchased directly from trustful vendors and stored / managed in OKmall exclusive logistics.
OKmall is responsible for product registration, package delivery, after-sales service, exchange, refund and other customer service.
If any of items being sold at okmall is not genuine or not the lowest price(in the biggest price comparison site in korea), we compensate.
An online shopping mall that has all the brands you need for your life!
Now you can also get to the app.
-Introduction of major functions -
1. Notification History
In push messages, you can get information about events, new arrivals, exchange/refund/repair notifications, etc.
2. Recent Products
If you want to see what you previously look out, use "recent products"
3. Wishlist
When you think about whether buy an item, you can keep it on "wishlist".
4. Shopping cart
If you are wondering what you put in your shopping cart, please go to your shopping cart conveniently.
5. My Page
Get order history, tracking shipment status, and additional benefits for member.
6. Exchange / Refund / Repair Progress
Free shipping, 2-3 years warranty
You can check the progress of the exchange / refund / repair.
Please send inconvenience or any suggestion to app@okmall.com with the model and operating system.
We will do our best to make your convenient shopping experience throughout reviewing.
access authority
Acorrding to Korean law(Article 22-2(Consent to Access Authority),
Act on promotion of information and communications network utilization and information protection, etc), let you know about necessary access authority for using this app service.
[Necessary access authority]
none.
[optional access authority]
1. camera : to take picture of product which ask for repairing
2. storage : to upload picture of product which ask for repairing
descriptionShort: OKOutdoor.com changed to OKmall with the goal of becoming the No.1 shopping mall

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Multi-language support for international customers.
- When purchasing a product, it has been added to go directly to the purchase screen.
- Fixed a problem where the authentication number input screen was initialized when searching for a password.
- Other minor matters and safety have been improved.

OKmall is not a sales intermediary site like other typical shopping mall or online marketplace.
All the thousands of items sold at OKmall is purchased directly from trustful vendors and stored / managed in OKmall exclusive logistics.
OKmall is responsible for product registration, package delivery, after-sales service, exchange, refund and other customer service.
If any of items being sold at okmall is not genuine or not the lowest price(in the biggest price comparison site in korea), we compensate.
An online shopping mall that has all the brands you need for your life!
Now you can also get to the app.
-Introduction of major functions -
1. Notification History
In push messages, you can get information about events, new arrivals, exchange/refund/repair notifications, etc.
2. Recent Products
If you want to see what you previously look out, use "recent products"
3. Wishlist
When you think about whether buy an item, you can keep it on "wishlist".
4. Shopping cart
If you are wondering what you put in your shopping cart, please go to your shopping cart conveniently.
5. My Page
Get order history, tracking shipment status, and additional benefits for member.
6. Exchange / Refund / Repair Progress
Free shipping, 2-3 years warranty
You can check the progress of the exchange / refund / repair.
Please send inconvenience or any suggestion to app@okmall.com with the model and operating system.
We will do our best to make your convenient shopping experience throughout reviewing.
access authority
Acorrding to Korean law(Article 22-2(Consent to Access Authority),
Act on promotion of information and communications network utilization and information protection, etc), let you know about necessary access authority for using this app service.
[Necessary access authority]
none.
[optional access authority]
1. camera : to take picture of product which ask for repairing
2. storage : to upload picture of product which ask for repairing

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- When purchasing a product, a function has been added to automatically select an option if it is a single option.
- An error in which out of stock information was not displayed in the product list has been fixed.
- Other minor matters and safety have been improved.
